data.prayer: Lord, teach your Word to the people of the the state of Va'a-o-Fonoti, so that they can follow your ways all their life.
data.verse: Teach me, Lord, the way of your decrees, that I may follow it to the end.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Va‘a-o-Fonoti, Samoa

data.prayer: Father, please send new teachers into the harvest, who can correct the lies of our enemy in the state of Va‘a-o-Fonoti, Samoa.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Father, let your Word be a lamp to the feet of the 316 believers in Va‘a-o-Fonoti, Samoa.
data.verse: your Word is a lamp to my feet and a light to my path.

data.prayer: Father, for those with enemies and who are afraid in Va'a-o-Fonoti, call them into your shelter and safety today.
data.verse: For you have been a refuge for me, a strong tower from the enemy.

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Samamea
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Samamea, Va‘a-o-Fonoti, Samoa.
Father, remind your church in Va'a-o-Fonoti that they can know and depend on the love you have for them.
data.verse: We know and have believed the love which God has for us. God is love, and he who remains in love remains in God, and God remains in him.

data.prayer: Father, please reward those who diligently seek you with a heart of faith in the state of Va'a-o-Fonoti.
data.verse: Without faith it is impossible to be well pleasing to him, for he who comes to God must believe that he exists, and that he is a rewarder of those who seek him.

data.section_summary:
the state of Va‘a-o-Fonoti, Samoa has a population of 1,700.

We estimate Va'a-o-Fonoti has 316 people who might know Jesus, 1,319 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 65 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 5 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: God in Heaven, only you can and should appoint evangelists. Please, appoint and send more to Va‘a-o-Fonoti, Samoa.
data.verse: And in the church God has appointed first of all apostles, second prophets, third teachers, then workers of miracles, and those with gifts of healing, helping, administration, and various tongues.
